layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutNGBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutNGBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x20
      LayoutNGBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 519x19
          text run at (0,0) width 519: "This paragraph should have a green background because its TITLE attribute is set."
